audioText: Un agent des routes de 24 ans a été victime d'un accident alors qu'il portait assistance à un véhicule en panne dans l'Eure.
question: What happened to the road worker?
options: He was helping repair a broken vehicle in Eure
He was involved in an accident while assisting a broken-down vehicle
He caused an accident while working on the roads
He was directing traffic around a vehicle breakdown
explanation: The road worker 'a été victime d'un accident alors qu'il portait assistance à un véhicule en panne' - was the victim of an accident while assisting a broken-down vehicle. The text indicates he was helping someone with a breakdown when the incident occurred.
